resources.string: Whether you are new to computers, use them everyday or only use them in your social life, this quiz will help you assess your basic computer skills.
Please scroll down to start the quiz.
a. an electronic device that receives data(input), processes data, stores data and produces a result(output)
b. an electronic device that receives information(input), stores data and produces a lot of data(output)
c. an electronic device that processes data(input), receives data and stores a result (output)
d. an electronic device that stores, produces and receives information
2. A computer consists of two main components:
3. True or False: Hardware is any part of your computer that has a physical structure.
4. Which of the following is considered computer hardware? (Check all that apply)
5. What is the computer term which refers to the initial screen showing icons for folders, files, and applications in a computer.
a. A financial system to help small business do math operation
b. An audio streaming service from the 1930s
c. A set of instructions or programs instructing a computer to do specific tasks
d. A video game that came up in the 1980s
7.What are the two main types of computer software?
a. System Software and Application Software
b. Microsoft Word and Windows XP
